meta.name: apache
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: Apache
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("BytesPerSec")) AS "bytes_per_sec" FROM :db:.:rp:.apache WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: bytes/s

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("ReqPerSec")) AS "req_per_sec" FROM :db:.:rp:.apache WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: requests/s

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("TotalAccesses")) AS "tot_access" FROM :db:.:rp:.apache WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: accesses/s
